title: Watch: The US and Russia's nuclear treaty is dead. What comes next?
summary_full: The expiration of New START means there are no limits on nuclear weapons between both countries for the first time since 1991.
summary_public: The expiration of New START means there are no limits on nuclear weapons between both countries for the first time since 1991.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: US and Russia's nuclear treaty is dead. What comes next?
